MODS:titleInfo.MODS:title: Details -- 1 1/2" scale detail of cellar windows, typical wall sections with exterior and interior elevations of window, section thru verge board taken at "A-A", typical girder post footing; screened porch and south gable end details -- section thru south wall looking west, section thru east wall looking north; east gabel end and bedr'm no. 3 beam details -- east wall looking south, section thru north wall looking west; section thru north gable end (complete detail to be given later); section thru west end of main hall (looking north) : Sheet no. 9,

MODS:mods.MODS:note: Digital image created from an analog slide.
